That‚Äôs something Trump will never understand. He doesn‚Äôt believe in anything more than Trump. 

It‚Äôs time for all Americans of conscience to repudiate this man.
Lincoln knew that when you serve, you do so selflessly. You don‚Äôt do it for the paycheck, the medal, or the uniform. You do it because you believe in America.

I can't explain why I came home and some of my friends didn‚Äôt. But what I do know is that they were great Americans, and we owe them a debt we can never repay. Abraham Lincoln solemnly honored America‚Äôs war dead as those ‚Äúwho gave the last full measure of devotion.‚Äù

Each time I was willing to give my life to keep that oath because I believed those presidents would try to do the right thing for the country. But we can‚Äôt say that about Trump, and that‚Äôs why he puts both our troops and national security at great risk.

He simply doesn‚Äôt understand or respect service. He views the world only as a series of transactions for his own benefit.

I took oaths under both Democrat and Republican presidents.

While the service of our fallen will remain the last full measure of their devotion, the comments of this president are the last full measure of his disgrace.
